descriptions.title: Existing files degradation
descriptions.text: A negative code health contribution from existing files (5 files). The code health delta decreased with -0.67 code health points. Existing content that was modified since the last analysis. Contributes to a positive code health if the scores of individual files improve.

descriptions.title: New files improvement
descriptions.text: A positive code health contribution from new files (3 files). The code health delta increased with 1.82 code health points. New content that was added to Git since the last analysis. Contributes to a positive code health trend if the score of the new files is higher than the average code health score in the codebase, otherwise it's a negative contribution.

descriptions.title: Existing files improvement
descriptions.text: A positive code health contribution from existing files (1 files). The code health delta increased with 0.31 code health points. Existing content that was modified since the last analysis. Contributes to a positive code health if the scores of individual files improve.
